title: What Lupita Nyong’o and Eric Adams Wore to the Party
description: Top outfits from the opening of David Geffen Hall, the American Ballet Theater gala and a “Black Panther” screening.
media:credit: Nina Westervelt for The New York Times
media:description: “This jacket was done for me by my tailor,” Mayor Eric Adams said at the David Geffen Hall gala, pictured here with Angela Chen, left, and Daisy Soros.
